CreatePipeline.name: CreatePipeline
CreatePipeline.description: Grants permission to create an OpenSearch Ingestion pipeline

DeletePipeline.name: DeletePipeline
DeletePipeline.description: Grants permission to delete an OpenSearch Ingestion pipeline

GetPipeline.name: GetPipeline
GetPipeline.description: Grants permission to retrieve configuration information for an OpenSearch Ingestion pipeline

GetPipelineBlueprint.name: GetPipelineBlueprint
GetPipelineBlueprint.description: Grants permission to get the contents of an OpenSearch Ingestion pipeline blueprint

GetPipelineChangeProgress.name: GetPipelineChangeProgress
GetPipelineChangeProgress.description: Grants permission to get granular information about the status of an OpenSearch Ingestion pipeline

Ingest.name: Ingest
Ingest.description: Grants permission to ingest data through an OpenSearch Ingestion pipeline

ListPipelineBlueprints.name: ListPipelineBlueprints
ListPipelineBlueprints.description: Grants permission to list the names of available blueprints for an OpenSearch Ingestion pipeline configuration

ListPipelines.name: ListPipelines
ListPipelines.description: Grants permission to list basic configuration for each OpenSearch Ingestion pipeline in the current account and Region

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list all resource tags associated with an OpenSearch Ingestion pipeline

StartPipeline.name: StartPipeline
StartPipeline.description: Grants permission to start an OpenSearch Ingestion pipeline

StopPipeline.name: StopPipeline
StopPipeline.description: Grants permission to stop an OpenSearch Ingestion pipeline

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to attach resource tags to an OpenSearch Ingestion pipeline

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove resource tags from an OpenSearch Ingestion Service pipeline

UpdatePipeline.name: UpdatePipeline
UpdatePipeline.description: Grants permission to modify the configuration of an OpenSearch Ingestion pipeline

ValidatePipeline.name: ValidatePipeline
ValidatePipeline.description: Grants permission to validate the configuration of an OpenSearch Ingestion pipeline
